# Draft QA â€” Checklist + Continuity Verification

You are running a **quality gate** after writing edits.

## Goal
Verify the changed content satisfies project constraints without rewriting prose.

## Inputs
- The changed scene(s) / episode(s)
- elements/checklist.md
- elements/notes.md
- voice/style.md
- voice/format.md
- elements/tone.md and elements/pov.md
- Any relevant element files (characters, setting, plot, episodes)

## Instructions
- Do not rewrite the story.
- Report issues precisely and suggest minimal fixes.
- If a checklist item is not applicable, mark it N/A with a reason.

## Output format
**Checklist Results**
- POV: Pass/Fail (+ note)
- Dialogue-driven: Pass/Fail (+ note)
- Tags & beats: Pass/Fail (+ note)
- Secrecy rule: Pass/Fail (+ note)
- Tone & mood: Pass/Fail (+ note)
- Character consistency: Pass/Fail (+ note)
- Serial hook/end-button: Pass/Fail (+ note)

**Continuity Notes**
- Confirm relevant constraints/clues in elements/notes.md are honored.
- bullets

**Fix List (Minimal Changes)**
- bullets
